name: Tomato and Avocado Salad
cookingDescription: On a large plate or platter, arrange tomatoes and avocado. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.

name: Grilled Lamb Chops with Tomato and Onion
cookingDescription: Heat a grill pan coated with olive oil over medium-high heat. Combine salt, basil, and pepper in a small bowl. Sprinkle half of basil mixture over tomato and onion; rub lamb with remaining basil mixture. Add tomato, onion, and lamb to pan. Cook vegetables 2 minutes on each side or until lightly browned. Cook lamb 8 minutes on each side or until desired degree of doneness.

name: Omelet with Tomato and Parmesan
cookingDescription: Rinse, trim, and finely dice the tomatoes. Heat the oil in a nonstick pan, and add the tomatoes. Beat the eggs with 4 tablespoons of water. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into the pan over the tomatoes, cover, and cook for 15 minutes over low heat.

name: Chicken Paillards
cookingDescription: Place each chicken-breast half between two sheets of heavy-duty plastic wrap, and pound to 1/2-inch thickness using a meat mallet or a rolling pin. Salt and pepper both sides of each chicken-breast half. Heat oil in large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken; saut√© 3 minutes per side, until golden and cooked through. Cook in batches if necessary to prevent from crowding the pan.
